name: Core API Release 31.0.0
description: This release brings you an enhancement and some bug fixes to our LoginRadius Core API, please see below for details:

FIXED.text: In case of optional and disable email flow,  restricting the manual linking of profiles having unverified email.
Special characters are allowed in the password field for the change password API.

Added.text: Introduce Email OTP as a new authenticator in MFA and ReAuthentication Flow.
